New Records: Shadab Khan scored the fastest 50 in 20 balls
Key Match Events: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort with a 22-ball 52 and 2/16 bowling figures
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3/14 and dismissed Quinton de Kock and Riley Rossouw
Tristan Stubbs and Heinrich Klaasen's partnership was the highlight of South Africa's innings
Shadab Khan forced an inside edge to claim South Africa's fifth wicket
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam was dismissed by Lungi Ngidi
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-curtailed and reduced to 14 overs per side
David Miller was ruled out due to an injury
Others: Anrich Nortje was the most successful bowler for South Africa with 4/41
